channel.title: How do you unbug monsters' health?
channel.description: When I made my server, all of the monsters' health was all messed up, they had 0 health and died in one hit and smeared up instead of dying, what do I do? :confused: :confused: :confused: Also, how do I make them walk a round and drop items?

item.title: How do you unbug monsters' health?
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

If your using hybridscape(the server that comes with the mopar client) go to where ever you installed moparscape (usuely C:\Program Files\MoparScape) then click on the hybridscape folder.Then open npc.cfg.
Then go on mopar right click on the npc your trying to get to have hp then look for “Examine” then to the right you shold see npc name and a number after that.Rember that number(its called a npcid btw)!then go back to npc.cfg press ctrl + F then in the box type in the npc number then you should see something like this

npc = npcid	Npcname				Lvl	0

change the 0 to something then close and save. then see if it worked.
moving and npc drops is up to you srry

Read full topic
item.source: How do you unbug monsters' health?
